description: 1 x Ash (applicant's ref. 11) - Reduce by 2m, (Remove deadwood);1 x Ash (applicant's ref. 15) - Reshape by shortening overlong lateral growth by 2m following removal of deadwood;1 x Sorbus (applicant's ref. 31) - Fell;1 x Ash (applicant's ref. 59) - Pollard to a height of 8m above ground level;1 x Oak (applicant's ref. 107) - Remove broken top leader, Reduce by 1.5m to reshape crown, Remove old pruning stubs back to main stem;Oak (applicant's ref. 118) - Remove deadwood, Fell self-sets;1 x Oak (applicant's ref. 128) - Reshape by 1m to balance crown;1 x Yew (applicant's ref. 161) - Remove deadwood, Tidy stubs;1 x Cupressus (applicant's ref. 162) - Lift to 4m to remove low limb, (remove deadwood);(1 x Pine, 1 x Ash and 1 x Larch (applicant's ref. 188, 194 and 200) (dead) - Fell);1 x Ash (applicant's ref. 207) - Pollard to a height of 10m above ground level;6 x Oak (applicant's ref. G9) - Lift to 4m to clear path, (sever Ivy);All standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order
site_name: St Josephs Gate (former St Josephs College Lawrence Street)Holborn CloseLondonNW7 4AZ
